title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 17, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 17, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark are joined by California Gubernatorial Recall Election hopeful Kevin Paffrath to hear about Kevin's ideas for the future of our state. Learn more about Kevin by going to his website MeetKevin.com

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
